This cannot possibly have happened :-). In JavaElementLabels.java:877, we're sure that the type is an anonymous type. IType.getSuperclassName() should then always return a non-null name. The code also accounts for bug 86313.

Moving to JDT/Core in case you have an idea how this could happen.
OK to close for now if you also cannot reproduce.
No idea how this could happen.
